metadata.description: The DNS domain name assigned to the Active Directory domain

The IP assigned to the Active Directory domain controller virtual machine

The CIDR assigned to the subnet used for other infrastructure services such as backup or PKI

The principal ID of the managed identity needing permissions on the Key Vault
